data.title: UNB Undergraduate Awards Search
data.text:
View more than 1,500 scholarships, bursaries and prizes administered by the University of New Brunswick.

If you wish to be considered for scholarship support, submit a UNB scholarship application. If you are looking for additional information, view our detailed award regulations.

UNB scholarships listed below are covered by the entrance or undergraduate scholarship application unless otherwise noted in the apply line in the description.

Prizes are awarded based on recommendation from the appropriate faculty or department. Bursaries are awarded by the Financial Aid Office.

Filter awards by name or type

Type any word in the search box to filter by award name, faculty or program, or;

Choose the drop-down option under “Award Type” to filter by award type
